fr.xephi.authme.datasource

Class AbstractSqlDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.datasource.AbstractSqlDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource, Reloadable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MySQL, PostgreSqlDataSource, SQLite

    public abstract class AbstractSqlDataSource
extends Object
implements DataSource
    Common type for SQL-based data sources. Classes implementing this must ensure that columnsHandler is initialized on creation.

      • hasSession

        public boolean hasSession(String user)
        Description copied from interface: DataSource
        Query the datasource whether the player has an active session or not. Warning: this value won't expire, you have also to check the user's last login timestamp.
        Specified by:
        hasSession in interface DataSource
        Parameters:
        user - The name of the player to verify
        Returns:
        True if the user has a valid session, false otherwise
